bibl.title: An Unknown Christian Complex in Alexandria.
Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984
bibl.author: DASZEWSKI, Wiktor A.

bibl.note: Rescue excavations (1981) in the area of Miami-Sidi Bishr in the eastern part of Alexandria. Ancient structures, end of the 4th-early 7th c. A.D.
DASZEWSKI Wiktor A., Hassan EL SHEIKH, Stanislaw MEDEKSZA, An Unknown Christian Complex in Alexandria.
Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984 (Varsovie, 1990) pp. 87-105, 15 figg., 3 plans.
